9(userValor) / 2(division) = 4.5 (approx)
(4.5(approx) + 2(division)) / 2 = 3.25(division)

9 / 3.25 = 2.7692307692307692
(3.25 + 2.7692307692307692) / 2 = 3.0096153846153846

9 / 3.0096153846153846 = 2.9904153354632587
(3,0096153846153846 + 2,9904153354632587) / 2 = 3,0000153600393216

9 / 3,0000153600393216 = 2,9999846400393215
(3,0000153600393216 + 2,9999846400393215) / 2 = 3,000000000039321

9 / 3,000000000039321 = 2,9999999999606790
(3,000000000039321 - 2,9999999999606790) / 2 =
